## Description
A ridiculous game created by [Flutter](https://flutter.dev/), all you have to do is touch the screen to make the bird leap¬†as long as you avoid the barriers, you'll be OK. Depending on how long you play for, the score will be calculated. On the screen, your top score will always be displayed. [Hive](https://docs.hivedb.dev/#/) is a lightweight, user-friendly, and ‚ù§Ô∏è Simple, powerful database with üéà NO native dependencies that we utilize.

### Issues
- The barriers are not 100% accurate
- According to the screen boundaries, there's no landscape.


## Installation
you can just download the `.apk` file from the [Release](https://github.com/moha-b/Flappy-Bird/releases).

if you clone it just run
 ```dart
$ flutter pub get
```
